entry.RedBlue: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry.Yellow: The gem in its forehead glows on its own! It walks with all the grace and elegance of a proud queen.
entry.Gold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
entry.Silver: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
entry.Crystal: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.
entry.RubySapphire: PERSIAN has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in the POKéMON’s surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
entry.FireRed: Has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. It is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite.
entry.LeafGreen: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry.Emerald: A PERSIAN’s six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry.HeartGold: Many adore it for its sophisticated air. However, it will lash out and scratch for little reason.
entry.SoulSilver: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: A very haughty Pokémon. Among fans, the size of the jewel in its forehead is a topic of much talk.
entry.X: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.
entry.Y: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.
entry.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Persian has six bold whiskers that give it a look of toughness. The whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in the Pokémon’s surrounding vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.
entry.Sun: It has a violent temperament. It will attack anything that looks it in the eye. Its sharp claws inflict deep wounds.
entry.Moon: It has a high opinion of itself, although not to the same extent as the Alolan Persian. It’s quite difficult to make friends with this Pokémon.
